description: n-th digit in the decimal expansion of the n-th root of n.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: a:= proc(n) Digits:= 20+n;       parse(convert(evalf(root(n, n)/10), string)[n+1])    end:seq(a(n), n=1..120);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Nov 19 2015
mathematica: Array[ Function[ n, RealDigits[ N[ Power[ n, 1/n ], n+6 ] ]// (#[ [ 1, n ] ])& ], 110 ]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Olivier GÃ©rard_
